sentence.Network_en: The years of ineffectual service count big in the bestowal of rewards.
sentence.Network_cn: 几年徒劳无益的服务,在论功行赏时就大有关系.

sentence.Network_en: Just because of the bestowal and self - confidence , we become stronger and more courageous.
sentence.Network_cn: 只因感恩与 自信, 让我们变得更加果敢与坚强.

sentence.Network_en: It's Heaven s Best Bestowal to me to meet you in the journey of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 在人生的旅途上遇见你是上天对我最大的恩赐.

list.abs: God is impartial , the people who has destiny in hand stands forever in the balance both ends , the people who is grasped by destiny knows that God bestows destiny on him only only .上帝是公平的，掌握命运的人永远站在天平的两端，被命运掌握的人仅仅只明白上帝赐给他命运！
You remember having plenty of time to bestow all your wisdom knowledge ., 你记得你有大量的时间去传授你所有的智慧和知识.
He has long bestowed honours in exchange for donations to his good causes ., 他长期以来一直用授予荣誉头衔来换取对他的慈善事业的捐赠.
The Passionate Giver You love bestow presents , and not just on official occasions ., 激情式送礼者你喜爱馈赠礼物 , 而且不只是在正式场合.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of conferring an honor or presenting a gift
2. a gift that is bestowed or conferred

auth_sentence.content: I wonder if the bestowal made us just a little bit different.
